snippet: A tour operator group has projected that European and American visitors to Russia would drop by about 30 percent this year, in large part because of the crisis in Ukraine.
abstract: Specter of widening conflict between Russia and Ukraine is causing some Western travelers to cancel their trips to Russia and spoiling high expectations among hotels and tour operators for summer travel season; tour operator group projects European and American visitors to Russia will drop by about 30 percent in 2014.
lead_paragraph: A tour operator group has projected that European and American visitors to Russia would drop by about 30 percent this year, in large part because of the crisis in Ukraine.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Trips to Russia, Fall Amid Conflict
headline.main: U.S. Trips to Russia Fall Amid Conflict
